item.title: Cyrptocurrency Prices and Google Trends Data
item.description: Introduction Blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies have come front and center as the total market capitalization close in on $800 million at the start of 2018 growing over 4300% since 2017 with much of the growth happening in recent months. With all the recent news on the subject, I thought it might be interesting to try to quantify the buzz against the historical cryptocurrency data.
